title: IS_PED_USING_ANY_SCENARIO
content:
0x57AB4A3080F851430x195EF5B7// IsPedUsingAnyScenario
BOOL IS_PED_USING_ANY_SCENARIO(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.Returns: Returns true if the ped is using any scenario.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_USING_ANY_SCENARIO
IsPedUsingAnyScenario(ped)
